name: ColdFusion: Avoid Templates with a high Fan-in
description: Avoid Artifacts with High Fan-Out (Fan-Out < X). The Fan-out of an Artifact is the number of other Artifacts that are referenced in it. When computing the Fan-Out of an Artifact, multiple accesses to the same component of an Artifact are counted as one access. The threshold is a parameter and can be changed at will. Artifacts are
output: This report lists all Template with a Fan-Out greater than X It provides the following information: Template full name, Fan-Out value
rationale: The higher the number of referenced Artifacts, the more difficult the maintenance and evolution as all updates in referenced Artifacts will have to be tested and taken into account.
remediation: Reduce the number of referenced Artifacts
